title: Hour 3 - Deshaun Watson Suspension, Juan Soto Trade
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Deshaun Watson Suspension, Juan Soto Trade
description:
Dan talks with his friend Rich Eisen about why Deshaun Watson should get a much longer suspension. The guys react live to news that Juan Soto will be heading to the San Diego Padres.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
